title: AI Solutions Architect
description: Design and deploy AI architectures for enterprise clients. Work with NLP, LLMs, vector search, MLOps, and model integration.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Build ML pipelines, optimize model performance, and productionize AI solutions using Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and cloud services.

title: Data Scientist
description: Analyze structured and unstructured data, build predictive models, and create insights dashboards to support business decisions.

title: AI Prompt Engineer
description: Develop and optimize prompts for LLM-based applications. Work closely with research and product teams to improve system outputs.

title: LLM Application Developer
description: Develop AI-powered applications integrating LLMs, embeddings, and vector databases. Experience with React/Node preferred.

title: MLOps Engineer
description: Build high-reliability ML pipelines, automate deployments, manage feature stores, and implement model monitoring & CI/CD.

title: AI Research Engineer
description: Work on frontier AI research topics like model alignment, fine-tuning, evaluation, and architecture improvements.

title: Vector Database Engineer
description: Optimize indexing, vector search performance, and retrieval pipelines. Experience with Pinecone, Weaviate, or Qdrant preferred.

title: AI Product Manager
description: Own AI product vision, roadmap, and delivery. Work with engineering and research teams to launch LLM-powered features.

title: GenAI Solutions Consultant
description: Work with enterprise customers to design GenAI solutions using LLMs, knowledge graphs, and automation workflows.
